name: Space M.A.M.A.
description:
Eventually babies are going to be in space. Who's going to take care of them? A Space M.A.M.A. of course! It's a Merry Autonomous Motherly Android - they can take care of your babies during their long travels much better than fleshy earthlings!

Designers and Programmers: Dylan DARTH Rader, Tyler Hancock, Mitchell Page

Artist: Dusty Langeberg, Emilio Gonzalez
